hero.title: Bridging Legal Borders, Empowering Sino-Japanese Business Compliance
hero.description: We combine international perspectives with local expertise to provide professional, reliable legal and business support for companies and individuals in Japan. We help clients who aim to conduct stable operations and legally compliant business expansion from China to Japan with a full range of legal consulting services and planning.

about.title: About Us
about.description: RIVER HOPE Japan Fujimoto Legal Consulting Office is a legal and business service institution established in Japan by River Hope Law Firm Indonesia Group. We specialize in providing comprehensive legal and business support services to foreign companies, Chinese companies in Japan, entrepreneurs, and individual clients.
about.team: Our team consists of lawyers, administrative scriveners, tax consultants, and business advisors who are familiar with the Japanese and international legal environments. We adhere to the principles of 'Integrity, Fairness, Professionalism, and Win-Win' to help clients avoid risks and protect their rights in their investments, establishment, and operations in Japan.
